solution_line_template: Aang, Sokka and Toph caught {aang_fish} fish + {sokka_fish} fish + {toph_fish} fish = <<{aang_fish}+{sokka_fish}+{toph_fish}={total_fish_caught}>>{total_fish_caught} fish.

The average catch of fish per person is {total_fish_caught} fish / {number_of_people} people = <<{total_fish_caught}/{number_of_people}={average_fish_per_person}>>{average_fish_per_person} fish per person.
